title: Fundamentals of Analysis
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of analysis. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Principles of Theory
description: In-depth analysis of theory principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Applied Practice
description: Comprehensive study of practice with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Applied Analysis
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in analysis. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Advanced Research
description: In-depth analysis of research principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Analysis
description: In-depth analysis of analysis principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Theory
description: Rigorous treatment of theory theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Advanced Practice
description: Rigorous treatment of practice theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.
prerequisites: CLAS 340 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in Methods
description: Advanced exploration of methods covering current research and industry practices.
prerequisites: CLAS 354 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in Applications
description: Rigorous treatment of applications theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.
prerequisites: CLAS 313 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced Workshop
description: Interdisciplinary approach to workshop combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.
prerequisites: CLAS 309 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Research
description: In-depth analysis of research principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
prerequisites: CLAS 383 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Analysis
description: Advanced exploration of analysis covering current research and industry practices.
prerequisites: CLAS 365 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Research
description: Comprehensive study of research with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.
prerequisites: CLAS 369 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in Research
description: Interdisciplinary approach to research combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.
prerequisites: CLAS 393 and senior standing or graduate status
